original: 1. Grant of Rights : Fox grants to  Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to  distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with  the Property “ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN” in the United  States: (A) 2 Scrat voicetones; (B) 2 John Leguizamo voicetones; and (C) 3 premium videos. Fox  also grants Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license  to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with  the Property “ICE AGE 2” outside of the United  States: (A) 4 Scrat voicetones; (B) 1 John  Leguizamo voicetone; and (C) 3 premium videos. (collectively, “IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products”) B. IA 2 AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS ROYALTY:
ollama_generated:
1. License Granted: The Licensee is granted a limited, non-exclusive license by Fox to distribute the specified Wireless Products associated with the Property "ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN" within the United States, and the Property "ICE AGE 2" outside of the United States, under the following conditions:

   (A) Within the United States, the Licensee may utilize 2 Scrat voicetones, 2 John Leguizamo voicetones, and 3 premium videos. For distribution outside of the United States in relation to "ICE AGE 2", the Licensee is entitled to use 4 Scrat voicetones, 1 John Leguizamo voicetone, and 3 premium videos. (collectively, “IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products”)

   B. IA 2 AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS ROYALTY:

   This clause introduces an obligation on the Licensee, stipulating that they shall pay royalties to Fox for the distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products, at a rate mutually agreed upon in writing by both parties. In the event no such written agreement has been reached, the default royalty rate shall be as specified in the applicable laws or regulations governing this transaction.

original: (“IA2 Audio and Video Royalty”).  For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee may not recoup any portion  of the Ice Age 2 Guarantee (as defined in Amendment 1)  through its sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video  Wireless Products.
ollama_generated: ("IA2 Audio and Video Royalty Clarification"). To eliminate any potential confusion, the Licensee is explicitly prohibited from recouping any portion of their Ice Age 2 Guarantee (as specified in Amendment 1) via the revenue generated by the sale or distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products. Instead, the guarantee obligations remain solely with the provider.

original: ***** The omitted portions of this exhibit have been filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to a request for confidential treatment under Rule 406 promulgated under the Securities Act of 1933.
ollama_generated: ***** It is noted that certain sections within this exhibit are being held in confidence, submitted to the Securities and Exchange Commission as per a request for confidentiality treatment in accordance with Rule 406 under the Securities Act of 1933. The disclosure of these omitted portions remains restricted and subject to the commission's review.
